document.full_text: a 17-foot jump shot by danny granger with 0.3 seconds to play gave the pacers their second victory in three days over the knicks.
document.title: pacers 119, knicks 117: no final shot for anthony after granger hits winner
lines_and_colors: a 17-foot jump shot by danny granger with 0.3 seconds to play gave the pacers their second victory in three days over the knicks.
